title: 'I don't want to look like this bizarre schizo': Kate Fischer reveals she has post traumatic stress disorder as she ... - Daily Mail
text: Share 85 shares 'So I often come across as aggressive, when really I'm just being defensive. And just trying to, everyone says who is this competent person? And it's like, I'm actually very incredibly vulnerable.' She added she was struggling to handle her condition. Letting it out: The 43-year-old personality and former model - who now is known as Tziporah Malkah - made the admission during a one-on-one chat with Casey Donovan on the show Frenemies: She previously said she wanted to quit I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!, after clashing with Olympian Lisa Curry (seen) 'And so I'm just like, to say, I'm just not coping. I'm just not handling it. I'm kind of arguing with people or I'm crying and I don't want to look like this bizarre schizo, do you know what I mean?' She added she wanted to make it all 'stop,' as the 'pattern' has happened since she was a child. Meanwhile, Lisa and Natalie spoke away from the camp and Natalie, - who has also clashed with Tziporah - said she 'felt sorry' for Tziporah. 'I'm worried about her, for her to be retaliating like that to everyone,' Natalie said. 'I'm worried about her': Meanwhile, Lisa and Natalie (L) spoke away from the camp and Natalie, - who has also clashed with Tziporah - said she 'felt sorry' for Tziporah On the show on Wednesday, Tziporah said she wanted to quit the show after clashing with Lisa, who she called a 'shithead.' 'I'm f**king sick of these b**ches,' Kate said at the time about Lisa and Natalie. 'I'm just f**king sick of it. I want to go home,' Tziporah said, bursting into tears as she cleaned the dishes with Nazeem Hussain and camp leader Jay Laga'aia. 'I'm f**king sick of these b**ches that don't understand me,' she added, about Lisa and Natalie. She had enough: On the show on Wednesday, Tziporah said she wanted to quit the show after clashing with Lisa, who she called a 'shithead' 'I've had a very, very strange life with lots of ups and downs. I know everyone has had their little ups and downs but my life has been like that,' she said, swinging her hand up and down. 'And I'm sick of people like f**king Lisa, you know,' she added, as the former Olympic swimmer Lisa walked over to try and help with the dishes. The Sirens star added to camera: 'I'm so glad I stopped being a celebrity for 10 years and got into a low paid job and had to learn about the real world for a while because otherwise I could be just s***headed as some of them are.' Tziporah and Lisa's feud began after dinner, when Tziporah wanted to relax on her bed, but Lisa - who had taken over Jay's leadership duties for the evening - wanted her to do the dishes. Clash: Tziporah and Lisa's feud began after dinner, when Tziporah wanted to relax on her bed, but Lisa wanted her to do the dishes She also argued with Natalie when she accused the singer of talking about her and Tom Arnold to Jay. She heard the pair saying that she and Tom were 'privileged' and weren't pulling their weight around camp because they didn't know how. 'Every single day you have a little fight with someone. It's hilarious,' Natalie told Tziporah. Tziporah said that Natalie, 'always picks on me.' Lisa chimed in, saying Tziporah can 'overreact' at things, before chatting to Tziporah when away from the group, with Lisa encouraging her to put the feud behind her. After Tziporah did the viper room tucker trial, Natalie sought out Tziporah so that they could put aside their differences. Natalie also at one point threatened to quit the show, if Tziporah didn't stop fighting with her.
